channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 日经指数走高，交易员等待美国通胀
item.description: Japanese stocks hit a near 34-year high on Wednesday while other Asian equities meandered close to one-month lows and bond markets traded cautiously ahead of U.S. inflation data due this week.翻译:日本股市周三触及近 34 年新高，而其他亚洲股市则徘徊在接近一个月低点的水平，债券市场在本周公布的美国通胀数据之前交投谨慎。
item.author: Tom Westbrook

item.title: 交易员等待美国通胀数据，美元稳定，比特币波动
item.description: The dollar was steady on Wednesday in cautious trading ahead of U.S. inflation data due later this week that is likely to influence the Federal Reserve's policy, while bitcoin was volatile after a fake social media post rattled markets.翻译:在本周晚些时候公布的美国通胀数据可能会影响美联储的政策之前，周三美元在谨慎交易中保持稳定，而在虚假社交媒体帖子扰乱市场后，比特币波动较大。
item.author: Ankur Banerjee

item.title: 美中在华盛顿结束为期两天的军事会谈
item.description: The United States and China concluded two days of military talks in Washington on Tuesday, the Pentagon said, the latest engagement between the two countries since they agreed to resume military-to-military ties.翻译:五角大楼表示，美国和中国周二在华盛顿结束了为期两天的军事会谈，这是两国同意恢复军事关系以来的最新接触。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾不认为中国卫星发射干扰选举
item.description: Taiwan's presidential office said it did not consider the launch of a Chinese satellite whose rocket flew over southern Taiwan an attempt at election interference ahead of presidential and parliamentary polls on Saturday.翻译:台湾总统办公室表示，不认为在周六总统和议会选举之前发射飞越台湾南部的中国卫星是企图干扰选举。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 英特尔用汽车“AI PC”芯片挑战英伟达和高通
item.description: Intel said on Tuesday it will launch automotive versions of its newest AI-enabled chips, taking on Qualcomm and Nvidia in the market for semiconductors that can power the brains of future cars.翻译:英特尔周二表示，将推出最新人工智能芯片的汽车版本，在为未来汽车大脑提供动力的半导体市场上与高通和英伟达展开竞争。
item.author: Joseph White

item.title: 早盘竞价：投资者寻求科技补剂，关注澳元和中国数据
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 哥谭市的报告对 Grifols 有何评价？
item.description: Shares in Grifols fell as much as over 40% on Tuesday, wiping $3.83 billion off its market value, after hedge fund Gotham City Research questioned its accounting, prompting the Spanish drugmaker to "categorically" deny any wrongdoing.翻译:在对冲基金 Gotham City Research 对其会计提出质疑后，Grifols 的股价周二下跌了 40% 以上，市值蒸发了 38.3 亿美元，促使这家西班牙制药商“断然”否认有任何不当行为。
item.author: Nell Mackenzie

item.title: 本田公布新电动车系列计划
item.description: Japanese automaker Honda Motor announced on Tuesday plans to launch a new electric vehicle series from 2026, as it plays catch-up with global rivals in the shift to battery-powered cars.翻译:日本汽车制造商本田汽车周二宣布，计划从 2026 年开始推出新的电动汽车系列，以追赶全球竞争对手向电池驱动汽车的转变。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 世界银行预测2024年全球经济增长将连续第三年放缓
item.description: The World Bank warned on Tuesday that global growth in 2024 is set to slow for a third year in a row, prolonging poverty and debilitating debt levels in many developing countries.翻译:世界银行周二警告称，2024年全球经济增长将连续第三年放缓，许多发展中国家的贫困现象将长期存在，债务水平将进一步恶化。
item.author: David Lawder

item.title: 由于进口下降，美国 11 月贸易逆差缩小
item.description: The U.S. trade deficit unexpectedly narrowed in November as imports of consumer goods fell to a one-year low amid slowing domestic demand, a trend that, if it persists in December, could result in trade having no impact on economic growth in the fourth quarter.翻译:由于国内需求放缓，消费品进口跌至一年来新低，美国11月贸易逆差意外收窄，如果这一趋势持续到12月，贸易可能不会对第四季度经济增长产生影响。
item.author: Lucia Mutikani

item.title: 哥谭市报告后，格里福斯将于周二下午召开董事会会议
item.description: Spanish pharmaceutical company Grifols is set to hold a board meeting on Tuesday afternoon in reaction to a report from Gotham City Research questioning the company's accounting released earlier, board member Tomas Daga told Reuters.翻译:西班牙制药公司 Grifols 董事会成员托马斯·达加 (Tomas Daga) 告诉路透社，该公司定于周二下午召开董事会会议，以回应 Gotham City Research 质疑该公司早些时候发布的会计报告的报告。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国集团：2023年中国可能取代日本成为全球最大汽车出口国
item.description: China is estimated to have overtaken Japan as the world's largest auto exporter in 2023, the China Passenger Car Association (CPCA) said on Tuesday, as BYD , Chery and other domestic automakers made major strides overseas.翻译:中国乘用车协会(CPCA)周二表示，随着比亚迪、奇瑞等国内汽车制造商在海外取得重大进展，中国预计将在2023年超过日本成为全球最大的汽车出口国。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早盘竞价：华尔街重新找到魔力 - 但前方仍存在障碍
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 英国牛津纳米孔公司（Oxford Nanopore）营收预警后股价下跌
item.description: Shares in Britain's Oxford Nanopore dropped nearly 12% on Tuesday, after the sensing technology company issued a revenue warning, citing a slowdown in China and the Middle East, along with staggered purchases from large clients.翻译:英国牛津纳米孔公司(Oxford Nanopore)周二发布收入预警，称其股价下跌近12%，原因是中国和中东经济放缓，以及大客户的交错采购。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国汽车品牌通过电动汽车升级提高盈利能力-瑞银
item.description: Chinese auto brands are set for better profitability in 2024 despite intensifying competition in the world's largest auto market, UBS analysts said on Tuesday, thanks to upgrades they have been making in their electric vehicle (EV) product mix.翻译:瑞银分析师周二表示，尽管全球最大汽车市场的竞争加剧，但由于中国汽车品牌不断升级电动汽车（EV）产品组合，中国汽车品牌预计将在 2024 年实现更好的盈利能力。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国卫星发射在关键投票前引发台湾攻击警报
item.description: Taiwan's government issued an air raid alert on Tuesday, saying a Chinese rocket carrying a satellite had flown over its southern airspace, which Taiwan's foreign minister described as part of a pattern of harassment days before a pivotal election.翻译:台湾政府周二发布空袭警报，称一枚携带卫星的中国火箭飞越台湾南部领空，台湾外交部长称这是关键选举前几天骚扰行为的一部分。
item.author: Ben Blanchard, Ryan Woo

item.title: 哥谭市会计查询使 Grifols 价值损失 38.3 亿美元
item.description: Shares in Grifols fell by 30% on Tuesday, wiping nearly $3 billion off its market value, after hedge fund Gotham City Research questioned its accounting, prompting the Spanish drugmaker to "categorically" deny any wrongdoing.翻译:在对冲基金 Gotham City Research 对其会计提出质疑后，Grifols 股价周二下跌 30%，市值蒸发近 30 亿美元，促使这家西班牙制药商“断然”否认有任何不当行为。
item.author: Inti Landauro, Joan Faus

item.title: 桥梁困境凸显台湾选举中对中国的分歧
item.description: Pointing at Xiamen's skyscrapers across the water from his office, Chen Tsang-chiang recalled how 30 years ago the southern Chinese city was as low-slung as his Taiwanese island of Kinmen.翻译:陈沧江指着办公室一水之隔的厦门摩天大楼，回忆起30年前这座中国南方城市和台湾金门岛一样低矮的情况。
item.author: Sarah Wu

item.title: 经济疲软、新冠疫情肆虐可能导致2023年中国人口再次减少
item.description: China's population likely dropped for a second consecutive year in 2023 due to a surge in COVID-related deaths after the country abruptly ended strict lockdowns, while weak confidence in the economy's prospects keeps birth rates depressed.翻译:由于中国突然结束严格的封锁，与新冠病毒相关的死亡人数激增，2023年中国人口可能连续第二年下降，而对经济前景的信心疲弱导致出生率低迷。
item.author: Farah Master

item.title: 在美国通胀数据和盈利数据公布之前，股市走软，收益率小幅上涨
item.description: Global stock indexes mostly dipped and Treasury yields edged higher on Tuesday, with investors bracing for key U.S. inflation data this week and the start of fourth-quarter company earnings.翻译:周二，全球股指大多下跌，美国国债收益率小幅走高，投资者等待本周关键的美国通胀数据和第四季度公司财报的开始。
item.author: Caroline Valetkevitch
